website_summaries.verdict: Scar, leader of the hyenas and villainous usurper of Pride Rock, translated surprisingly well into this tall and intimidating yet squishable plush toy.
pros: Perfect replica of his animated appearance
Felt claws are a nice detail
cons: A bit pricey, but it’s a top-quality plush toy

customer_reviews.title: Color me Impressed: I’m in Love
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow am I impressed! This is a wonderful high quality plush! Not to mention an actual Disney authentic product. I’m an extremely picky person when it comes to quality and this exceeded my expectations and surprised me. He’s lovely! Large, soft, and beautifully new. When mine arrived his fur was pristine like he’d never been taken out of the bag. Love him! An EXCELLENT Scar plush for any Lion King fan!
customer_reviews.author: Brahms H.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This plush is so cute, so glad he's finally affordable. His features are spot on! He's soft, but looks like he does in the movie: menacing and evil! He does not have a Disney store patch (the little circle with the Disney store authentication), but the tags say he's from the store. So, I don't believe it's some knock off; something that has happened before. If he is though, you really can't tell... He's that well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cuddling!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in my 20’s, but I have anxiety, so I like to have something to cuddle at night. Scar is perfect for me! He’s very soft and huggable, and looks just like the animated version.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee

customer_reviews.title: Great soft stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: My first order got lost and when I contacted the seller they were excellent. Offered to give me a refund or send me a replacement. I chose a replacement and received it within a few days. Excellent costumer service! As for the product itself it is good size, very soft and my 6 year old loves it! Would definitely recommend for a Scar fan!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear13

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old recently watched the Lion King. She decided that Scar is her favorite character. She was very excited and somewhat scared when I gave her this 😂 Now she's asleep with it in her bed lol
customer_reviews.author: Ashley2019

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson got this for Christmas...his 3 year old brother got mufasa so they can play together. Size is great, a bit large but they seem to love that. They live the lion king and these large plush characters were a win!
customer_reviews.author: Jenell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Authentic. Looks percect. Cones wrapped in a clear bag, original tags, in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Co0kimama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY GOOD! I am a big fan of Scar and always wanted him as a plush. This is exactly what I wanted. Get it. For the price it’s charging it’s a HUGE offer. Worth every penny. The only negative thing would be the coloring. It has a rather cream color than actually the OG dark orange. But it still looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Plotnikoff

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great size and even better price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Scar, especially for the price. It's very in keeping with the original movie version and is much bigger than I thought it would be for the price. It seems to be well made and is pretty soft. It's easily one of my son's favorite Christmas gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: ajgtampa2

customer_reviews.title: Soft and just like the movie
customer_reviews.text: This scar looks like the movie so much that our daughter won't let him sleep in her room because he is too scary. But he is soft and she likes him when she is watching the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Soft and well made Scar toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this scar stuffed animal! It's quite large and soft and he uses it to act out the Lion King with his other toys.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: He LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVES Lion King. He has Simba stuffed animal and wanted Scar. So I ordered it and he Loves it. It's just the right size for my 2 year old grandson. He loves to sleep with it
customer_reviews.author: Tina Ormiston

customer_reviews.title: Scar was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: It was a hit with my little psycho villainess of a niece! She carries it everywhere and it was the highlight gift at her third birthday party! Makes me question my future agreements to babysit though 😅😅
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS!! this is a must for a scar fan, he was a gift from my fiancé! yeah hes a bit pricey but WORTH IT!! shipping was good he came in a box and wrapped in plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Talia Renee

customer_reviews.title: Scar from The Lion King- terrific.
customer_reviews.text: A tad pricey for a stuffed animail but it is fantastic. The size is perfect. My grand daughter was so happy when I gave it to her.
customer_reviews.author: josephine passalaqua

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cuddly Scar (oxymoron)
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! It was exactly the size he wanted to add to his lion king menagerie.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughters birthday and she absolutely loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: That ist a great toy! My son loves hin so much! He wish Thema mufasa, too! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Grube

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love him. Scar's a cute and cuddly lion. I highly recommend adding this legend of darkness to your TLK, collections. :-) #BePrepared for the cuteness!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 4 year old grandson he absolutely loved it
customer_reviews.author: aleeshaS

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, it’s perfect for dogs. 😂 My Blue Heeler loves it, it’s her personal bedtime pal!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan & Armaine

customer_reviews.title: Scar Plushies
customer_reviews.text: I want a whole army of plushies of Scar in my room and I want to cuddle them all!! I’m a huge Scar fan so be prepared for some cuddliness!!
customer_reviews.author: Shaye

product_meta.title: Disney Scar Plush - The Lion King - 14 Inch
product_meta.description: When imaginary play stories needs a little evil, this Scar plush fits the bill perfectly. Inspired by the Lion King villain who takes over as king, he's cuddly – even if his personality isnt.
feature_bullets: Faux fur mane, bears and tail accents

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars116 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
